title: End to End Deep Neural Networks Radio Receiver for Speech Signals
abstract: Long short-term memory (LSTM) Hochreiter et al. is a powerful type of neural network that can capture long range dependencies and nonlinear dynamics. Frequency modulation FM is a nonlinear encoding of information in a carrier wave. In this paper we present a novel application of software defined radio (SDR) based on LSTM recurrent neural networks to decode audio signal from its noisy frequency demodulated version.
